member.name: TsShiftDir
member.summary: Elements of the TsShiftDir enumeration specify which direction an anchor is moved.

member.name: TsShiftDir.TS_SD_BACKWARD
member.summary: Specifies that the anchor will be moved to the region immediately preceding a range of text.

member.name: TsShiftDir.TS_SD_FORWARD
member.summary: Specifies that the anchor will be moved to the region immediately following a range of text.
